entry.title: Thursday: Chance of light snow. High minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of light snow late this morning and this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 43 this morning and minus 26 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 04:00 AM EST Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill near minus 33. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:00 AM EST Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending late in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming east 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:00 AM EST Thursday 23 March 2023
